original_text: When the soldiers from Israel and Judah saw what had happened, they chased after the Philistines. They shouted their war song as they ran. They chased the Philistines all the way to Gath, and then to the gates of Ekron town. The dead bodies of the Philistine soldiers were lying everywhere on the road to Shaaraim, as far as Gath and Ekron.
korean_text: 이스라엘과 유다 사람들이 일어나서 소리 지르며 블레셋 사람들을 쫓아 가이와 에그론 성문까지 이르렀고 블레셋 사람들의 부상자들은 사아라임 가는 길에서부터 가드와 에그론까지 엎드러졌더라

sentences.original_text: When the soldiers from Israel and Judah saw what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘과 유다의 군사들이 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: They chased the Philistines all the way to Gath
and then to the gates of Ekron town
The dead bodies of the Philistine soldiers
were lying everywhere on the road to Shaaraim
as far as Gath and Ekron
